Lectures

This page provides open-access slides from selected recent lectures and talks (starting from December 2021)

  • May 18, 2022. Is an ‘optimal’ solution desirable in practice? Decision support for renewables deployment through Spatially Explicit Practically Optimal Alternatives. Invited presentation for the GIZ. Go to the slides

  • Dec 16, 2021. Humans in the loop. Challenges and way forward in the use of MGA to support real-world energy policy decisions. Invited lecture for the journal club of TU Berlin managed by Fabian Neumann. Go to the slides

  • Feb 11, 2022. Can hydrogen integration in energy systems be the key to the acceleration of the energy transition? Short lecture for the TPM Faculty of TU Delft. Go to the slides
